channel.title: TIMES NOW | Facebook RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an RSS feed of the three most recent posts at https://www.facebook.com/Timesnow

item.title: #WATCH | Maharashtra Dy CM Devendra Fadnavis's wife Amruta F
item.description: #WATCH | Maharashtra Dy CM Devendra Fadnavis's wife Amruta Fadnavis and actor #SalmanKhan attended an event and appealed for eco-friendly Ganpati idols for the upcoming #Ganpati festival in Mumbai.

item.title: Catching a moment with our favourite superstar, Hrithik Rosh
item.description: Catching a moment with our favourite superstar, Hrithik Roshan! #HrithikRoshan #CelebSpotted
